title: A War of Words
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy, and Joey Galloway discuss the College football Playoff. The guys gives us there top 6 teams prior to the first official rankings being released. The Crew react to the war of words between Dabo Swinney and Mike Norvell, and look ahead to some potential upsets in this weekends slate of games.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB live Crew react to Dabo and Mike Norvell"s comments.
